lines.text: I have a great need of money, and for a great need, an old man will take a great risk.
The Cobra Goddess will avenger herself! On by one, you will die!
Only a snake with a brain could have got into that room last night and singled out that same kid. It's almost as if... well, it's absurd, but... as if he were meant to go that way.
The secret meeting is at nine o'clock.
The cobra has a fascination. It's like looking death in the face.
You know, it doesn't make any sense. A guy goes through a whole war without a scratch and then ends up like this!
